title: Machine Learning
summary: Employ both supervised and unsupervised machine learning, to make predictions or to understand data.

title: Data Analysis
summary: Learn how to use Python with Pandas, Matplotlib, and other modules to gather insights from and about your data.

title: Quantum Computer Programming
summary: Learn the basics and concepts of working with quantum computers and qubits through practical applications and the Qiskit package.

title: Game Development
summary: Create your own games with Python's PyGame library, or check out the multi-platform Kivy.

title: Python Fundamentals
summary: Learn the basic and intermediate Python fundamentals.

title: Web Development
summary: How to develop websites with either the Flask or Django frameworks for Python.

title: Bots & AI
summary: Creating various software bots, like bots in games, in chats, and to interact with the web. Not to be confused with robotics!

title: Robotics
summary: Control hardware with Python programming and the Raspberry Pi.

title: GUIs
summary: Create software with a user interface using Tkinter, PyQt, or Kivy.
